pullRequest.title: HDDS-3685. Remove replay logic from actual request logic.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What changes were proposed in this pull request?
Remove the replay logic from actual requests.
What is the link to the Apache JIRA
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/HDDS-3685
How was this patch tested?
Existing tests, will add a few more tests to cover this scenario.

beforeCommit.message: for now add back replay, and see later how it can be removed from proto, as now it is locked, compilation fails
fix test according to new updated code"

afterCommit.message: fix test according to new updated code"

nodes.bodyText: Should this return value be set to repeatedOmKeyInfo?
Any reason for keeping this around?
